Name: Bronze Adonis
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A simple yet fabulous twist on the Adonis.
History: Created in 2008 by Julian de Féral at The East Rooms, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Bronze Adonis contains 113 calories
